channel.title: Looking for npc id list please help
channel.description: Looking for an ipc id list, and how do i get them to stay there once i log out?

item.title: Looking for npc id list please help
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

theres already an included list in your MoparScape30 folder, just click all_IDs, then open Monsters.

and to keep em there when you log out, you have to add them to your autospawn.cfg file (you might not see the .cfg part) which is included in your source code if you have one

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for npc id list please help
